name: GPUDay.Export
description: Contents and configuration required for initializing the GPU Day site.
author: Lombiq

Message.Expression: Please fill out the form before submitting.
Email has been successfully sent. {{ Request.Form.Message }}

Queries.Template: select DocumentId from DateTimeFieldIndex where ContentType = 'Talk' and Published = 1 and ContentField = 'StartOfTalk' and DateTime >= '{{ EventDate | date:"%Y-%m-%d" }}' and DateTime < '{{ EventDate | date:"%s" | plus:86400 | date:"%Y-%m-%d" }}' order by DateTime
Queries.Name: TalksByDate

Queries.Template: select DocumentId from ContentItemIndex where ContentItemId = '{{ SpeakerId }}' and ContentType = 'Speaker' and Published = 1
Queries.Name: SpeakersById

Queries.Template: select ti.DocumentId from TaxonomyIndex ti join NumericFieldIndex tfi on ti.DocumentId = tfi.DocumentId where ti.Published = 1 and ti.ContentType = 'Speaker' and ti.ContentField = 'Year' and ti.TermContentItemId = '{{ YearId }}' and tfi.ContentField = 'Order' order by tfi.Numeric
Queries.Name: SpeakersByYear

Queries.Template: select DocumentId from ContentItemIndex where ContentItemId = '{{ LocationId }}' and ContentType = 'GoogleMapsLocation' and Published = 1
Queries.Name: GoogleMapsLocationsById

Queries.Template: select DocumentId from DateFieldIndex where (ContentType = 'GPUDay' or ContentType = 'OldGPUDay') and ContentField = 'FromDate' order by Date desc
Queries.Name: EarlierEvents

ContentTypePartSettings.Description: Provides a collection behavior for your content item where you can place other content items.

TaxonomyFieldSettings.Hint: Relevant speakers will be selected based on this value.

Subtitle.Text: Massive parallel computing for science and industrial application

ContactBox.Html:
GPU Day 2023

The conference will be held at:
Conference centre
Hotel Mercure Budapest Castle Hill
1013 Budapest, Krisztina Körút 41-43

TravelingByPublicTransport.Html:
Traveling by Public Transport:

The hotel is next to Budapest-Déli Railway station, which can be reached by Metro 2.
Travel planning of public transport: BKK futár

Taxi services:

Fő Taxi: +36 1 222 2222
6x6 Taxi: +36 1 6666666
